dimensions.label: Problem Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically break down problems into smaller parts and analyze each component to find a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and experience to guide them towards a creative solution.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively express their opinions and advocate for their own interests, even if it means confronting others.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground with others, listening to their perspectives and working together to find a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage risk in decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and stability, weighing the potential benefits against the risks before making a move.
Your FarTwin will be willing to take calculated risks and seize opportunities that align with their goals.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information or skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be self-directed, taking charge of their own learning and seeking out resources to meet their interests.
Your FarTwin will benefit from collaborative learning environments, seeking guidance from others and sharing knowledge with peers.

dimensions.label: Technical Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly skilled and confident in their technical abilities, using them to enhance their work and personal life.
Your FarTwin will have a basic understanding of technology and know how to use common tools, but may not be as proficient or comfortable with more complex applications.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach cultural differences?

options.description: Your FarTwin may hold biases or stereotypes based on their own cultural background, potentially leading to misunderstandings or miscommunications with others.
Your FarTwin will be open-minded and considerate of diverse perspectives, actively seeking to learn from and appreciate differences.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and budgeting, making responsible financial decisions to ensure stability.
Your FarTwin will be more likely to splurge on luxury items or experiences, prioritizing enjoyment over long-term financial security.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their schedule?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for meticulous organization and punctuality, potentially leading to an overly packed or stressful schedule.
Your FarTwin will prioritize adaptability and go with the flow, allowing for more relaxation and spontaneity in their daily routine.
